name: Perpcoin
description: PERPCOIN isn't just another memecoin - it's a revolution in perpetual trading culture. Built by traders, for traders, with the power of community-driven growth. Imagine a coin that never stops. Like literally never. Your bags? Eternal. Your hopium? Permanent. Your mom's disappointment? Also permanent. Welcome to $PERPCOIN, the first memecoin that refuses to touch grass. Perpetual cope, perpetual memes, and an unhealthy obsession with candles going up only. Buy. Hold. Forget. Remember. Panic. Buy again. This is the way of $PERPCOIN. For the culture.
